channel.title: Comments on: The Killers stink up Control soundtrack

item.title: By: Sophia72
item.dc:creator: Sophia72
item.description: Purists and eclectic listeners won't agree to anything, big surprise. I am of the latter persuasion and LIKED the Killer version.
item.content:encoded: Purists and eclectic listeners won’t agree to anything, big surprise. I am of the latter persuasion and LIKED the Killer version.

item.title: By: DieLaughing
item.dc:creator: DieLaughing
item.description: what a horrible cover. There are songs you can cover in your own way, but then there are songs you just don't change. Shadowplay is one of them,
item.content:encoded:
what a horrible cover.
There are songs you can cover in your own way, but then there are songs you just don’t change. Shadowplay is one of them,

item.title: By: SpacemanT
item.dc:creator: SpacemanT
item.description: Yo.As a hardcore Joy Division fan who was around back then I love the Killers version, and I'm not a huge fan of theirs but I think they have some good tracks. The best thing about the cover is that it is not full reverence and just goes for an un selfconscious kick off. I like alot, amybe lots of bands could have done it better , muse, interpol, radiohead....but they did'nt.
item.content:encoded: Yo.As a hardcore Joy Division fan who was around back then I love the Killers version, and I’m not a huge fan of theirs but I think they have some good tracks. The best thing about the cover is that it is not full reverence and just goes for an un selfconscious kick off. I like alot, amybe lots of bands could have done it better , muse, interpol, radiohead….but they did’nt.

item.title: By: Mock You
item.dc:creator: Mock You
item.description:
"Wah, Wah, it's the Killers, Oh no, they covered a song of a band who I love, Wah I tell you, Wah! I built up a high wall around me and if some other band (The Killers for you in this case) tries to climb up this wall and I actually see them, I CRY, WAH!"
ROFL, get real.
item.content:encoded:
“Wah, Wah, it’s the Killers, Oh no, they covered a song of a band who I love, Wah I tell you, Wah! I built up a high wall around me and if some other band (The Killers for you in this case) tries to climb up this wall and I actually see them, I CRY, WAH!”

ROFL, get real.

item.title: By: jessi
item.dc:creator: jessi
item.description: GASP!!! How dare you? the killers are pure-genious!! That song "SHADOWPLAY" Rocks, let me guess youall who hate the killers enjoy country music, huh? YOU should be ashamed of urselfs. People dont appreciate real music these days. *sigh*
item.content:encoded:
GASP!!!
How dare you?
the killers are pure-genious!!
That song “SHADOWPLAY” Rocks,
let me guess youall who hate the killers enjoy country music, huh?
YOU should be ashamed of urselfs.
People dont appreciate real music these days.
*sigh*

item.title: By: party
item.dc:creator: party
item.description: I just picked up a copy of the CONTROL soundtrack and the Killers version of Shadowplay is SO GOOD! It comes right after "What Goes On" by Velvet Underground and an audio clip from the (highly recommended) movie and works perfectly. This is seriously a next level cover.....At the very least, give it a listen and see for yourself before you hate on it just because of who plays it........
item.content:encoded: I just picked up a copy of the CONTROL soundtrack and the Killers version of Shadowplay is SO GOOD! It comes right after “What Goes On” by Velvet Underground and an audio clip from the (highly recommended) movie and works perfectly. This is seriously a next level cover…..At the very least, give it a listen and see for yourself before you hate on it just because of who plays it……..

item.title: By: killersfan
item.dc:creator: killersfan
item.description:
you guys sound like people who hate whatever is popular. the killers sold millions of records so you hate them. you sound like u haven't even heard the song, like u hate the song just Because it's the killers.
don't let your politics cloud your ability to be open-minded. "oh, this is a bid for commercial audiences". ok. so what? what does that have to do with the Actual Song?
Now does the song really suck, or do u just hate it because they are pop? i bet u sit around talking about awesome Bloc Party is, but next year you'll be hating them because they finally got a mainstream following.
Or maybe the killers just suck. i don't know. i'm gonna go steal this song from somewhere and find out.
item.content:encoded:
you guys sound like people who hate whatever is popular. the killers sold millions of records so you hate them. you sound like u haven’t even heard the song, like u hate the song just Because it’s the killers.

don’t let your politics cloud your ability to be open-minded. “oh, this is a bid for commercial audiences”. ok. so what? what does that have to do with the Actual Song?

Now does the song really suck, or do u just hate it because they are pop? i bet u sit around talking about awesome Bloc Party is, but next year you’ll be hating them because they finally got a mainstream following.

Or maybe the killers just suck. i don’t know. i’m gonna go steal this song from somewhere and find out.
